languages.text: "Весьма вольное изложение, но очень близко к правде... Уж не считаете ли вы, что леди Моллес-Секандас организовала похищение мужа? Впрочем, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кому как не вам{/d} судить о подобном".

"A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."
languages.original_text: "Весьма вольное изложение, но очень близко к правде... Уж не считаете ли вы, что леди Моллес-Секандас организовала похищение мужа? Впрочем, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}кому как не вам{/d} судить о подобном".

Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

"A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

"A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

languages.text: "Eine lose Beschreibung der Ereignisse, aber dennoch erstaunlich nahe an der Wahrheit. Ihr glaubt doch wohl nicht, dass Lady Molles-Secundas die Entführung ihres Gatten selbst organisiert hat? Obwohl Ihr Euch natürlich mit derlei Vorfällen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}bestens auskennt{/d}."
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: "Eine lose Beschreibung der Ereignisse, aber dennoch erstaunlich nahe an der Wahrheit. Ihr glaubt doch wohl nicht, dass Lady Molles-Secundas die Entführung ihres Gatten selbst organisiert hat? Obwohl Ihr Euch natürlich mit derlei Vorfällen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}bestens auskennt{/d}."

languages.text: « Voilà une description relativement vague et pourtant si proche de la réalité. Vous ne croyez tout de même pas que dame Molles-Secundas a orchestré l'enlèvement de son mari ? Maintenant que j'y pense, vous avez une certaine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expertise{/d} en la matière. »
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une description relativement vague et pourtant si proche de la réalité. Vous ne croyez tout de même pas que dame Molles-Secundas a orchestré l'enlèvement de son mari ? Maintenant que j'y pense, vous avez une certaine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expertise{/d} en la matière. »

languages.text: “尽管您对整个事件的描述不够严谨，但却非常接近事实真相。您应该不会认为，是莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人本人策划了这场针对她丈夫的绑架吧？但话说回来，或许有人会说，您是此类事务的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}专家{/d}。”
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: “尽管您对整个事件的描述不够严谨，但却非常接近事实真相。您应该不会认为，是莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人本人策划了这场针对她丈夫的绑架吧？但话说回来，或许有人会说，您是此类事务的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}专家{/d}。”

languages.text: «Es una descripción un tanto vaga de los hechos, pero sorprendentemente parecida a la realidad. No insinuará que lady Molles-Secundas orquestó el secuestro de su esposo, ¿verdad? Aunque bueno, admito que usted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}entiende mucho{/d} de estos asuntos».
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: «Es una descripción un tanto vaga de los hechos, pero sorprendentemente parecida a la realidad. No insinuará que lady Molles-Secundas orquestó el secuestro de su esposo, ¿verdad? Aunque bueno, admito que usted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}entiende mucho{/d} de estos asuntos».

languages.text: 「出来事の大まかな説明とはいえ、驚くほど真実に近いですね。まさか、レディ・モレス・セクンダス自身が夫の誘拐を仕組んだとお考えではないでしょう？もっとも、あなたはこの手の事件については{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}専門家{/d}と言えるかもしれませんが」
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: 「出来事の大まかな説明とはいえ、驚くほど真実に近いですね。まさか、レディ・モレス・セクンダス自身が夫の誘拐を仕組んだとお考えではないでしょう？もっとも、あなたはこの手の事件については{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}専門家{/d}と言えるかもしれませんが」

languages.text: "Olayların üstünkörü bir açıklaması ama şaşırtıcı derecede gerçeğe yakın. Gerçekten Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın bizzat eşinin kaçırılmasını planladığını mı düşünüyorsunuz? Gerçi böyle olaylar konusunda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}uzman{/d} olduğunuz söylenebilir."
languages.original_text: "A loose description of the events, and yet one that is remarkably close to the truth. Surely you do not think that Lady Molles-Secundas herself orchestrated her husband's kidnapping? Although, one might say you are an {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}expert{/d} on such incidents."

traits.locale_text: "Olayların üstünkörü bir açıklaması ama şaşırtıcı derecede gerçeğe yakın. Gerçekten, Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın bizzat eşinin kaçırılmasını planladığını mı düşünüyorsunuz? Gerçi böyle olaylar konusunda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}uzman{/d} olduğunuz söylenebilir."
